Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Kedzie-Homan
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Kedzie-Homan due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Kedzie-Homan due to police activity. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #94 California Temporary Northbound Reroute near California/Belmont
ShortDescription: NB 94 California buses are temp. rerouted via California, Addison, Western, Belmont, Rockwell & into the terminal due to street blockage near California/Belmont

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Addison, Western, Belmont, Rockwell and into the terminal due to street blockage near California/Belmont.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
